configure

Class SemkitConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • configure.SemkitConfiguration

  • public class SemkitConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Define your constants in this class. A default configuration file must be in the same folder as the jar file if you want to use it.
    Author:
    ericcharton

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SemkitConfiguration.API
      Allows to use constants under the form thisclass.API.RestURI

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String APIAccount
      Give here the API key of your Wikimeta API Account
      static java.lang.String CONFIG_FILE
      Name of the config file: by default config_sample.cfg
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> CONFIG_MAP_API
      This is the hash used to collect configuration information
      static java.lang.String NLGbAsePath
      Give here the path to access to the NLGbAse metadata (used only to load REDIS base)
      static java.lang.String URInameOfRes 
      static java.lang.String URItoGet
      Give here the URI of RDF repository
      static java.lang.String WMRestURi
      Give here the URI of the Wikimeta REST service
